phrases: Takeo sometimes puts other people's feelings before his own,
because he just wants the other person to be happy...
I think that was the first time I have ever screamed.
My cheap, plastic umbrella would not have kept her dry, anyway.
I thought I saw you in the city today.
Maybe I just imagined it because I wanted to see you.
What are you doing two days from now?
I do not have a shift that day.
Do you want to go somewhere?
Lately, we have not spent much time together.
Well, honestly, I just want to see you.
I want to see you, too.
Yamato-chan, you always look like you are enjoying your job.
I am just happy being around cakes all day.
But I guess I have learned a lot I did not know
about hardships and challenges that were not obvious to me before.
Rinko, about the cakes for the competition.
I would like to brainstorm tomorrow because it is a holiday.
My whole career as a patissier hangs on this!
I cannot hang out with you tomorrow.
I am sorry, after I brought it up.
Ichinose-san's going to be in a competition.
He said his career depends on it.
I am supposed to be helping him, so...
Good luck prepping for the competition, Yamato.
Of course you have to support that.
From: Yamato Rinko The Competition's Right Around the Corner The district prelims are in one week.
I did want to see you.
That is why I like Yamato.
That is the kind of person she is.
I am a better fit for Rinko for sure!
She just does not know there are other men who are a better fit for her!
Takeo, can you stand about a meter behind me?
What do you guys want with my girlfriend?
Is that his bodyguard or something?
It is weird not having Yamato-san here.
Other guys would be better for her.
Maybe Yamato just does not know anyone.
What do you mean, she just does not know?
Actually, even if it is true, so what?
Even if the other guy's someone who can easily do things I cannot,
or someone out of this world...
I do not want to lose her to anyone.
I can only make cookies that are like rice crackers.
Next time, let us come with Rinko!
I cannot talk about things that really interest Yamato.
I do not have a car.
And I cannot even call her by her first name.
I guess I am really selfish.
In the future, Yamato might decide to choose someone else.
For now, while she can smile by my side...
I will not let you have Yamato.
You came all the way here to tell me that?
You thought I would give up if you did?
No, but I will not let you have her.
I will accept that as a challenge.
Wait, you should be the one being challenged.
There is no advantage or disadvantage there.
You can be more aggressive about it!
How the patissier feels about her?
Are you sure you can leave her alone with him?
From: Yamato Rinko I am going to work with Ichinose-san after my shift tonight.
I cannot come up with anything that feels right.
Yeah, none of them are bad.
But none of them call out to me.
I do not get the same feeling I had when I met you and thought you were my muse.
I do not feel like I have met the one...
I think I understand what you mean by that feeling!
Rinko, can you pipe out those meringues for me?
Sorry to make you come along.
If I were not here, you would get arrested.
Did you come to interfere with Rinko and me?
I thought you would try to pull something while the two of you were alone.
Why would I spring something before we feel the same way about each other?
Right now, I want to focus on the competition!
Was it the Japan Snack Competition?
So you will not do anything?
Well, I am sure we basically feel the same way for each other anyway.
I will take the proper steps.
I kind of guessed what you were thinking!!
I will get the gold medal in this competition.
I will win it, and tell Rinko how I feel about her.
Ever since she came, things have been looking up for me.
My whole world's begun to change.
I do not expect you to understand,
but Rinko is destined to be my muse.
When I open my own store in the future,
I want her to be there, as my muse.
That is a grand vision you have got.
I will prove it to you by winning the gold medal.
I will not let you have Rinko.
is the last day you will be her boyfriend.
He is been working hard every day, even on his days off.
His career depends on it, too.
I would like him to win the gold medal.
I have to work hard, too.
On calling her by first name and stuff.
By the way, what is a muse?
You look like you are having fun.
Before I met you, I was alone.
I was obsessing about how my creations did not sell out that one time,
How it feels to see a great cake and wanting to make one yourself...
How good it feels to have someone buy your cake...
You are the one who made me remember that...
Remember how important that is, Rinko.
Do not do anything to her!!
Um, he is my boyfriend, but...
He says they look like they are plastic.
His cookies are really assertive, too.
I want to eat them again.
But a taste you want again and again.
I think I have an idea!
I will work to make my idea into reality.
Rinko, once the competition's over, I want to tell you something.
I bet we feel the same way about each other now.
But it would be such a waste.
I will win the gold medal.
I have you as my muse, Rinko.
The day of the competition, you will not be able to help me.
But can you come to the competition?
This is the day of the snack competition.
If his words sway her, I will...
Sorry, I am here way too early.
I texted you, but I did not get a response.
Sorry, I left my cell somewhere.
but he said he had something to tell me afterward.
I wonder if he is going to ask me if I want to be a full-time employee.
It would be so tempting, but I do not know what to do!
He said I am a source of strength for him or something like that...
How did you know that, Takeo-kun?
But I am not a muse.
I do not have that kind of power...
I do not know what to do.
Maybe he means you help him to get into his work when you are around.
Now I am not so stressed about it.
I am glad to hear that.
Talking to you always calms me down, Takeo-kun.
I do not want her with anyone else.
I do not want her to leave.
I want her smiling at my side forever.
You mean the gold medal, Takeo-kun?
That did not really calm me down.
Want to go to the beach?
You are going to eat that?
Oh, it is just that you are a normal guy, after all.
But seeing you unsure about yourself...
Being worked up for days on end...
Saying stuff about not wanting to let other men have her...
I am glad I got to see that side of you.
It will be fine, I swear.
I am glad I have Suna.
Once you get a girlfriend and worry about that stuff, I will laugh at you, too!
You would not laugh, not ever.
Oh, sorry, I meant let us get the gold medal!
Yeah, I will win the gold medal for you, Rinko.
I want you to win it for yourself.
You mean, you want me to win it for the two of us.
Oh, so once it starts, I cannot help you, right?
Is there anything I can help with beforehand?
I feel calm, and there is nothing to worry
I left my tools at the store.
I was so focused on bringing the ingredients...
but if I go now, I will not return in time.
I cannot ask the owner to leave the store to bring them.
You have been working so hard!
I know someone who can help when something like this happens!
Um, we are at the competition site right now,
There is no way he would help me!
Um, they are in a black case.
My name's on it in white.
I will text you where it is happening.
I do not think he will come.
Takeo-kun will make it work somehow!
He could have just called me, and I would have come over.
Ichinose-kun must have been worried about the store.
Oh, I will give you money for a taxi...
He looked faster than a taxi
He said he would come, but I am sure he will run away.
If he helps me, he will lose Rinko.
Takeo's headed for the competition site with the equipment.
There is no way he would come.
So he will be there soon...
Did I get here in time?
And did he swim here or something?
What is with all that sweat?
I will win the gold medal.
I wish him the best of luck.
Somehow, I feel like he is cheering me on.
He cannot have forgotten what I said about winning the gold medal
and telling Rinko how I feel.
I do not really understand him,
but I will acknowledge that Rinko's boyfriend is a good man!
All the cakes are pretty amazing.
I need to go to the bathroom.
Why is it that the things that are so important,
are the things you can never see?
They will announce the results in an hour!
I was able to give it everything I had.
I do owe you my thanks,
but I will not hold back.
The silver medalists are Suzuki Shinya-san and Mikura Hiroto-san.
And the gold medal of C'est Nouveau Patissier Competition goes to
What inspired you to make this cake?
but keeps you coming back for more...
A cake that makes an unforgettable impression.
And finally, a cake with strength!
He worked hard and produced results.
Are you going to sell at the store?
You changed the cake again from when I saw it last.
I think I will call this cake Rinko.
I am dedicating this gold medal to you, Rinko.
From this day forward, will you be my one, and only, muse?
That was so sudden, I was taken aback.
Even if you do not choose me,
I will support the decision that makes you happy.
I hope you will choose me.
I hope you will keep smiling with me.
I would be happy to help you.
But from the very first time I saw him,
The important things in life, like feelings, hearts, and souls,
are all things you can never see.
The more you try to reassure yourself that they exist,
the more you feel they do not exist at all.
But right now, I know for sure that they do exist.
They are so close, you can almost touch them.
I am not a muse or anything like that.
What helped you win the gold medal today
I think it was your hard work and talent.
Why do you look like you are agreeing?
So please keep making wonderful cakes!
I know you are a good guy, but I am definitely a better fit for her...
I am the one who thought wrong.
I will become the best man in the world that can make people happy with his cakes.
Did you know what was going to happen?
I did not know how Ichinose-san felt.
Of course, I did not know how you felt, either.
How you felt about what was going on with me...
I felt that I could not lose you.
So this is how she would have looked if I would used her first name all this time.
Someday, I will be able to say that like it is not such a big deal.
That makes school festivals and trips even better!
That makes sports festivals and trips even better!
Guess we are in the same class for another year.
I wish I could have been in the same class as Master...
I am in the class next to Sunakawa-kun.
I could not have asked for more.
How many springs has it been?
Oh, this cake is called Rinko.
C'est Nouveau Patissier Competition Gold Medal Prize
It has the same name as you, Rin-chan.
I made it so people who eat it
Suna, I managed not to mess up this time.
But if I lose sight of things again
and start going in the wrong direction...
I think I would break something.
Seriously, he was like three meters.
He looked like the ogre from the picture book I read yesterday!
I will stay on the right path,
so Yamato can understand all the things that cannot be seen.
